name: Blueberry Astrid
description:
Warning: Contains blueberry inflation fetish material, including optional popping.

Hello again, and sorry for the hiatus this past month! Here's a mini-game commissioned by Timebrain (www.deviantart.com/timebrain) featuring Astrid from How to Train Your Dragon, made using art by freakinweirdo on DeviantArt. Check out his work at: https://www.deviantart.com/freakinweirdo

In this game, Astrid has already undergone a blueberry transformation, but still wants more. Click and drag the berries that grow around the screen to her mouth and she'll eat them, gradually swelling afterwards (sometimes the berries take a while to activate).

There's a selection of voice samples in-game, so there's a separate toggle for them on the start screen and during gameplay. The popping toggle affects the gameplay, and can't be changed mid-game.

Controls:
R to restart
Left mouse and hold on berry to drag it
Left click on Astrid's belly to bounce it
Hold right mouse on Astrid's belly to rub it

In-game, berries will gradually grow along certain spots on-screen. Larger berries will have a greater and longer-lasting effect, but waiting too long will cause them to fall. Clicking a berry will also drop the surrounding berries. Left-click and hold the mouse button to drag a berry to Astrid to cause growth. As she grows and when her belly is rubbed, cosmetic floating hearts will appear.

When she's full, the berries will shrink away and stop appearing if popping is disabled, signalling the maximal size and end of the mini-game. If popping is enabled, instead there will be one or more creaking moments as she's fed berries, the last of which will cause a blue explosion and set her back to her starting size, allowing the mini-game to continue.

Thanks again to Timebrain for commissioning this mini-game (and being patient), to freakinweirdo for creating the artwork, and to everyone who's kept following my work despite the recent drought.
